mapper.select:
SELECT AuthMenu.ID AS id , AuthMenu.NAME AS name , AuthMenu.RESOURCE_ID AS resourceId , AuthMenu.TYPE1 AS type1 , AuthMenu.TYPE2 AS type2 , AuthMenu.PARENT_ID AS parentId , AuthMenu.ROOT_ID AS rootId , AuthMenu.MENU_INDEX AS menuIndex , AuthMenu.MAX_LEVEL AS maxLevel , AuthMenu.ICO AS ico , AuthMenu.DESCRIPTION AS description , AuthMenu.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , AuthMenu.CREATE_TIME AS createTime , resourceIdAuthResource.NAME AS resourceIdName , resourceIdAuthResource.CODE AS resourceIdCode
FROM AUTH_MENU AuthMenu INNER JOIN AUTH_RESOURCE resourceIdAuthResource ON AuthMenu.RESOURCE_ID = resourceIdAuthResource.ID
AND AuthMenu.ID = #{vo.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.NAME = #{vo.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.RESOURCE_ID = #{vo.resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.TYPE1 = #{vo.type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.TYPE2 = #{vo.type2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.PARENT_ID = #{vo.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.ROOT_ID = #{vo.rootId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.MENU_INDEX = #{vo.menuIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND AuthMenu.MAX_LEVEL = #{vo.maxLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND AuthMenu.ICO = #{vo.ico,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.DESCRIPTION = #{vo.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.UPDATE_TIME = #{vo.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.CREATE_TIME = #{vo.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY menuIndex
